New Records: Virat Kohli hit his first T20I century since November 2019
Bhuvneshwar Kumar's second T20I five-wicket haul
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli's unbeaten 122 helped India post 212 for 2
Miscellaneous Highlights: India ended a forgetful Asia Cup 2022 campaign on a high
Afghanistan faltered in the Super 4 stage, losing all three of its games
Others: KL Rahul (62 off 41) and Kohli shared an entertaining 119 off 76 balls for the opening wicket
India secured a 101-run win over Mohammad Nabi's side in Dubai
